game.title: The Lost City of Eldarath
game.objective: Explore the lost city and retrieve an ancient artifact.
game.description: Rumors have surfaced about a hidden city deep within the nearby mountains, said to contain ancient artifacts and treasures. The village elder has approached you with a request to investigate and retrieve one such artifact.
game.reward: Golden Sword of Eldarath, 100 gold pieces

task.objective: Speak with the village elder and gather information.
task.description: Eira will provide you with a map leading to the lost city. Listen carefully for any additional information or clues that may aid in your journey.
task.location: Village of Brindlemark, near Eira's hut

task.objective: Climb to the entrance of the lost city.
task.description: The map will lead you to a narrow path that winds through the mountains. Follow it until you reach the entrance to the lost city, which appears as a hidden cave.
task.location: Mountain Path leading to Lost City Cave

task.objective: Navigate the tunnels and chambers within the lost city.
task.description: Use your wits to navigate through the treacherous tunnels, avoiding traps and finding a way deeper into the city. You may need to solve puzzles or fight off hostile creatures.

task.objective: Retrieve the Golden Sword of Eldarath.
task.description: Once you reach the heart of the city, claim the Golden Sword and return to Eira with your findings.
